params.name: filePath
params.description: The path to the file you are checking.

examples.title: Tag Syntax
examples.code:
<cfscript> 
 filePath = expandPath("./myfile.txt"); 
 a = fileOpen(filePath); 
 b = fileRead(filePath); 
 writeOutput(isFileObject(a)); 
 writeOutput(isFileObject(b)); 
 writeOutput(getFileInfo(filePath).type); 
 writeOutput(structKeyExists(getFunctionList(), "isFileObject")); 
 </cfscript>
